Name: Procrastination Cocktail
Ingredients: 5 ml Green Chartreuse (or alternative herbal liqueur)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of lemon zest twist.
EXPRESS lemon zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: A wet martini flavoured with copious amounts of limoncello (which slightly sweetens and adds surprisingly subtle lemon favours) and a dash of Chartreuse which shines through.
History: Recipe created by Paul Clarke, the Seattle-based cocktail enthusiast behind the excellent cocktailchronicles.com .
Nutrition: One serving of Procrastination Cocktail contains 177 calories
